My personal interests range from orchestration of computing systems, artificial intelligence and quantum computing

content:
Hello World, my name is Lorenzo! Welcome to my personal website! Here you will find my CV and also some of my thoughts and stories, as well as opinions and insights in the tech field!
Enjoy!

title: Hello world! My name is Lorenzo
